ContentDesc_Zel Tajaal - Zelenia: Calyx's trail has led you to Alexandria's castle and into a wicked trap. Seeking to take more precise measurements of your strength, Calyx pits you against a mechanical guardian forged from Sphene's memories of Zelenia, the second-in-command of the royal knights. The queen implores you to lay this affront to her dear friend's honor to rest. Make ready to test your mettle against one of Alexandria's finest blades!
Instancecontenttextdata_42300_Text: Upon my blade I swear, no harm shall come to Her Highness!
Instancecontenttextdata_42301_Text: You will not defile Zelenia's memory any longer!
Instancecontenttextdata_42311_Text: Feel the sting of my divine blade!
Instancecontenttextdata_42313_Text: I know this technique... You must keep moving!
Instancecontenttextdata_42315_Text: That her bladework should be recreated so faithfully...
Instancecontenttextdata_42316_Text: Have care! Zelenia was capable of much, much more!
Instancecontenttextdata_42318_Text: I will show you the soul of a royal knight!
Instancecontenttextdata_42322_Text: You've no time even to fear my wrath!
Instancecontenttextdata_42326_Text: The sigils channel magic! Be on your guard!
Instancecontenttextdata_42327_Text: You must brace for blade and magic both!
Instancecontenttextdata_42330_Text: I have pledged my life to the kingdom!
Instancecontenttextdata_42335_Text: I will suffer none to threaten Alexandria!
Instancecontenttextdata_42336_Text: I am sworn to protect my queen! I will die before I yield!
Instancecontenttextdata_42337_Text: That's right... Zelenia was always there to protect me...
Instancecontenttextdata_42338_Text: I know this is merely a reconstruction...and yet...
